    • Constructor Detail

      • ColoredPointListImpl

        public ColoredPointListImpl(List<Vector3> points,
                    List<Color> colors)
        Creates a new point list backed by the specified lists. The lists are stored by reference and should not be modified.
        Parameters:
        points - the points
        colors - the colors
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either argument is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the sizes of the lists are different
